message: Does any one use Ghost CMS? this CMS make a big buzz in blogging community, some people say it will smash Wordpress ?!

data.message: Every CMS out there says it will smash WordPress. It hasn't happened yet. If you want the Ghost workflow, you use Ghost. If you want the WordPress ecosystem, you use WordPress. Move on.

What can work for me might not work for you. it depends on what works best for your use case. So far Wordpress is the most popular by numbers which means ... you need to give Ghost CMS a try and share with us your review :)
